name: Clickity Cluck
description:
Welcome to Clickity Cluck! You play as Cluck Norris as you battle and amass an animal army to take back your farmland from the invading robots.

- Left click your way through this mini adventure game.

- Buy new animals from the farmhouse

- Seize your farm land back!

Credits:

Assisting with Code, Brainstorming ideas and just downright awesome - Coldie, lukeh, Chat GPT

Background Music - Theodore Vassilakoglou

Thumbnail and in-game icons - Midjourney
